title: Hitting the Enter/Return key in the Find/Replace dialog doesn't do anything on Mac OS X
description: When using Eclipse 3.0 M2 (Build id: 200307181617) on Mac OS X 10.2.6, there is an issue with the Find/Replace dialog. Pressing the Enter/Return key after typing in a search term does not perform a Find operation as expected.
OB: Open the Find/Replace dialog (Edit -> Find/Replace) and type in a search term. Pressing the Enter/Return key does not trigger any action.
EB: Pressing the Enter/Return key in the Find/Replace dialog on Mac OS X should perform a Find operation, just like clicking on the 'Find' button.
SR:
1. Open the Find/Replace dialog (Edit -> Find/Replace).
2. Type in a search term into the text box.
3. Press the Enter/Return key.
Expected: The software should perform a Find operation.
Actual: Nothing happens.
